      Create amount transfer operation of one asset to content. Amount is transferred to author and co-authors of the content, if they are specified. Fees are paid by the "from" account. For more options see class TransferOperation constructor.

      • listAllPublishersRelative

        public io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> listAllPublishersRelative(java.lang.String lowerBound,
                                                                     int limit)

        Get a list of accounts holding publishing manager status.

        Parameters:
        lowerBound - the name of the first account to return. If the named account does not exist, the list will start at the account that comes after lowerbound
        limit - the maximum number of accounts to return (max: 100)
        Returns:
        a list of publishing managers

      • listAllPublishersRelative

      • findAll

        public io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> findAll(java.lang.String term,
                                                   SearchContentOrder order,
                                                   java.lang.String user,
                                                   java.lang.String regionCode,
                                                   java.lang.String type,
                                                   ContentObjectId startId,
                                                   int limit)

        Search for term in contents (author, title and description).

        Parameters:
        term - search term
        order - ordering field. Available options are defined in enum SearchContentOrder
        user - content owner account name
        regionCode - two letter region code, defined in enum Regions
        type - the application and content type to be filtered, use ContentTypesKt.contentType method
        startId - the id of content object to start searching from
        limit - maximum number of contents to fetch (must not exceed 100)
        Returns:
        the contents found

      • findAll

        public io.reactivex.Single<java.util.List> findAll(java.lang.String term,
                                                   SearchContentOrder order,
                                                   java.lang.String user,
                                                   java.lang.String regionCode,
                                                   java.lang.String type,
                                                   ContentObjectId startId)

        Search for term in contents (author, title and description).

        Parameters:
        term - search term
        order - ordering field. Available options are defined in enum SearchContentOrder
        user - content owner account name
        regionCode - two letter region code, defined in enum Regions
        type - the application and content type to be filtered, use ContentTypesKt.contentType method
        startId - the id of content object to start searching from
        Returns:
        the contents found

      • createPurchaseOperation

        public io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.model.operation.PurchaseContentOperation> createPurchaseOperation(Credentials credentials,
                                                                                                           ContentObjectId contentId,
                                                                                                           Fee fee)

        Create a purchase content operation. For more options see class PurchaseContentOperation constructor.

        Parameters:
        credentials - account credentials
        contentId - object id of the content, 2.13.*
        fee - class Fee fee for the operation, by default the fee will be computed in DCT asset. When set to other then DCT, the request might fail if the asset is not convertible to DCT or conversion pool is not large enough
        Returns:
        a purchase content operation
        See Also:
        class PurchaseContentOperation

      • createTransfer

        public io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.model.operation.TransferOperation> createTransfer(Credentials credentials,
                                                                                           ContentObjectId id,
                                                                                           AssetAmount amount,
                                                                                           java.lang.String memo,
                                                                                           Fee fee)

        Create amount transfer operation of one asset to content. Amount is transferred to author and co-authors of the content, if they are specified. Fees are paid by the "from" account. For more options see class TransferOperation constructor.

        Parameters:
        credentials - account credentials
        id - content id
        amount - amount to send with asset type
        memo - optional unencrypted message
        fee - class Fee fee for the operation, by default the fee will be computed in DCT asset. When set to other then DCT, the request might fail if the asset is not convertible to DCT or conversion pool is not large enough
        Returns:
        a transfer operation
        See Also:
        class TransferOperation

      • transfer

        public io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.model.TransactionConfirmation> transfer(Credentials credentials,
                                                                                 ContentObjectId id,
                                                                                 AssetAmount amount)

        Transfers an amount of one asset to content. Amount is transferred to author and co-authors of the content, if they are specified. Fees are paid by the "from" account.

        Parameters:
        credentials - account credentials
        id - content id
        amount - amount to send with asset type
        Returns:
        a transaction confirmation

      • createRemoveContentOperation

        public io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.model.operation.RemoveContentOperation> createRemoveContentOperation(ContentObjectId content,
                                                                                                              Fee fee)

        Create remove content operation. Sets expiration to head block time, so the content cannot be purchased, but remains in database. For more options see class RemoveContentOperation constructor.

        Parameters:
        content - content id
        fee - {@link AssetAmount} fee for the operation or asset id, if left undefined the fee will be computed in DCT asset. When set, the request might fail if the asset is not convertible to DCT or conversion pool is not large enough
        See Also:
        class RemoveContentOperation

      • createAddContentOperation

        public io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.model.operation.AddOrUpdateContentOperation> createAddContentOperation(AccountObjectId author,
                                                                                                                CoAuthors coAuthors,
                                                                                                                java.lang.String uri,
                                                                                                                java.util.List<ch.decent.sdk.model.RegionalPrice> price,
                                                                                                                org.threeten.bp.LocalDateTime expiration,
                                                                                                                Synopsis synopsis,
                                                                                                                Fee fee)

        Create request to submit content operation. For more options see class AddOrUpdateContentOperation constructor.

        Parameters:
        author - author of the content. If co-authors is not filled, this account will receive full payout
        coAuthors - if map is not empty, payout will be split - the parameter maps co-authors to basis points split, e.g. author1:9000 (bp), author2:1000 (bp), if author is omitted from this map, it is assigned 10000 (bp_total) minus sum of splits
        uri - URI where the content can be found
        price - list of regional prices
        expiration - content expiration time
        synopsis - JSON formatted structure containing content information
        fee - {@link AssetAmount} fee for the operation or asset id, if left undefined the fee will be computed in DCT asset. When set, the request might fail if the asset is not convertible to DCT or conversion pool is not large enough
        See Also:
        class AddOrUpdateContentOperation

      • createAddContentOperation

        public io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.model.operation.AddOrUpdateContentOperation> createAddContentOperation(AccountObjectId author,
                                                                                                                CoAuthors coAuthors,
                                                                                                                java.lang.String uri,
                                                                                                                java.util.List<ch.decent.sdk.model.RegionalPrice> price,
                                                                                                                org.threeten.bp.LocalDateTime expiration,
                                                                                                                Synopsis synopsis)

        Create request to submit content operation. For more options see class AddOrUpdateContentOperation constructor.

        Parameters:
        author - author of the content. If co-authors is not filled, this account will receive full payout
        coAuthors - if map is not empty, payout will be split - the parameter maps co-authors to basis points split, e.g. author1:9000 (bp), author2:1000 (bp), if author is omitted from this map, it is assigned 10000 (bp_total) minus sum of splits
        uri - URI where the content can be found
        price - list of regional prices
        expiration - content expiration time
        synopsis - JSON formatted structure containing content information
        See Also:
        class AddOrUpdateContentOperation

      • update

        public io.reactivex.Single<ch.decent.sdk.model.TransactionConfirmation> update(Credentials credentials,
                                                                               java.lang.String content,
                                                                               Synopsis synopsis,
                                                                               java.util.List<ch.decent.sdk.model.RegionalPrice> price,
                                                                               CoAuthors coAuthors,
                                                                               Fee fee)

        Update content. Update parameters are functions that have current values as arguments.

        Parameters:
        credentials - author credentials
        content - content uri
        synopsis - JSON formatted structure containing content information
        price - list of regional prices
        coAuthors - if map is not empty, payout will be split - the parameter maps co-authors to basis points split, e.g. author1:9000 (bp), author2:1000 (bp), if author is omitted from this map, it is assigned 10000 (bp_total) minus sum of splits
